title: Batman v Superman 2016 FANEDIT No-Lex-Edit 1080p 6ch x264 AVC
description:
Batman.v.Superman.Dawn.Of.Justice.2016.FANEDIT.No-Lex-Edit.1080p.6ch.x264.AVC.mkv

PLEASE DO NOT DOWNLOAD WITHOUT READING THIS DESCRIPTION OR THE NFO

THIS IS NOT THE COMPLETE MOVIE
THIS IS A FANEDIT WITH MOST SHOTS AND DIALOG BY LEX LUTHOR REMOVED
EVERY EDIT IS NOTED AS A CHAPTER AND THEY ARE LISTED IN THIS NFO

THIS IS THE X264-AVC VIDEO ENCODE WITH LC-AAC 5.1 AUDIO
THERE IS ALSO AN X265-HEVC/HE-AAC ENCODE AVAILABLE THAT IS 28% SMALLER

Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice (2016) FANEDIT No-Lex-Edit
video: 1920x800 AVC CRF=24.25 ~2242kbps preset=veryslow
audio: LC-AAC 5.1 384kbps surround sound
custom named chapters
source: Ultimate Edition Blu-Ray
blu-ray: 3h02m33s
fanedit: 2h38m23s - 24m10s REMOVED - 2,263,983,000bytes
  http://www.imdb.com/title/tt2975590/  

This is a FANDIT of Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice Ultimate Edition Blu-Ray with most shots and dialog from Lex Luthor removed. The goal is to experience BvS without the very different interpretation of Lex Luthor presented by Jesse Eisenberg, Zack Snyder, and the writing team of Chris Terrio and David S. Goyer. In this way, the story of Batman, Superman, and Wonder Woman meeting, fighting, and uniting can be viewed on their own.

Please note that this is a labor of love since I'm a huge fan of DC and Gotham comics in particular. While I was very familiar with Zach Snyder's directing style and had read about the many controversies regarding BvS, I was constantly taken out of the movie experience by this version of Lex Luthor. While watching BvS the first time, I kept thinking "what would this movie be like without Lex?" Thus, the No-Lex-Edit was born.

There were no named versions of the chapters from the Ultimate Edition Blu-Ray so custom named chapters were created for all the Blu-Ray chapter points. Also, chapters with descriptions were included for every edit that removed some material. A complete list of the chapters is included at the end of the nfo file. Note, some of the chapters overlap or occur very closely together.

The chapter format is as follows:
* ChXY.0 - the .0 chapters are the original chapter points from the Blu-Ray
* ChXY.Z - the .Z equals .1, .2, etc and is an edit point after that original Blu-Ray chapter ChXY.0
* every .Z (.1, .2, etc) chapter has a description that starts with EDIT
* please see the nfo for a chapter naming example and a complete list of the chapters

By using these EDIT chapters, you can jump to a time in the FANEDIT with the edits and see and hear how the edit flows. If you wonder what was removed, just look at the chapters in the nfo file or with MediaInfo or with your video player (e.g. PotPlayer, VLC, etc).

Please check out other DC Comics, Gotham (TV series), FANEDITS, documentaries, Rifftrax, MST3K, Battlestar Galactica, Star Trek, and more at:
  https://thepiratebay.org/user/bsg4you/  
and leave any corrections, criticism, comments and requests.

Thanks, bsg4you
